Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class ResourceChoiceController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.ResourceChoiceController
public class ResourceChoiceController
extends Controller
Class that represents the controller of the ResourceChoice page of the game On this page the user, except player 1, will have to choose one or two resources of his choice based on his position in the game
